page.title: 20THE SCHOOL, PLAISTOW
page.content:
{Described by its pupils.
The school was built in 1869, the front part is 116 years old, and the new extension is 13 - 15 years old. There are four classrooms, an activity area where we cook, paint or work on our computer. We have a playground and an adventure playground with climbing frames and stepping stones. In the summer we go in the seimming pool.
Our school has a headteacher and three other teachers who all come to school by car. We have 80 - 90 children who start school when they are 5 years old and go on to Kirdford School when they are 8.
The survey was compiled by Loxwood County Primary School assisted by Plaistow County First School W. Sussex
